summary: Dedicated Full-Stack Web Developer with 9+ years of experience across Full-Stack Web and back-end development. Proficient in crafting responsive, user-centric web solutions for diverse industries. Proven ability in team leadership, optimize SEO, and manage project effectively. Passionate about delivering engaging web experiences and continuously expanding expertise in the latest technologies.

professionalExperience.description: Collaborate with startups and SMEs to develop and maintain websites and web applications using modern technologies.
highlights: Website Design & Development: Develop and maintain responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and WordPress. Optimized performance and reliability for seamless user experiences.
SEO & Analytics: Increased average SEO scores from 50 to 80+, boosting search engine visibility. Leveraged analytics to enhance user engagement.

Team Leadership: Lead a small team of developers and designers in delivering web solutions, from email templates to full-fledged websites with CMS. Implemented organizational tools, improving team communication and efficiency.
Project management: Managed projects for clients like Yayasan Petronas, Petrosains, Paramount Property, Taylor U
UI/UX improvements: Collaborated with content and design teams to enhance UI/UX, increasing user retention. Streamlined navigation and improve SEO consistency across all platforms.

Multimedia Proficiency: Beyond web development, frequently assisted with graphic design, video editing tasks, showcasing versatility and supporting team success. Provide tech support, helping colleagues solve challenges in unfamiliar technical areas.

professionalExperience.description: Participated in the development and maintenance of web applications for corporate clients, leveraging modern JavaScript frameworks.
highlights: Collaborated in agile teams to deliver high-quality web solutions
Implemented responsive UI components using React and state management
Integrated with RESTful APIs and GraphQL endpoints
Optimized applications for performance across devices

keyProjects.name: YayasanPetronas.com.my - CSR Platform
keyProjects.description: Developed and launched a CSR-focused website, enhancing the visibility of social initiatives and increasing donor engagement.
highlights: Leveraged intuitive UX design to ensure seamless navigation and engagement
Successfully drove awareness of the organization's activities
Culminated in a high-profile launch event led by Dr. Wan Azizah

keyProjects.name: Petrosains.com.my - Nation's STEM Advocacy
keyProjects.description: Redesigned and revamped the Petrosains website to better support STEM advocacy in Malaysia.
highlights: Created an overhauled and refreshed interface catering to diverse user groups from students to educators
Significantly enhanced visibility and accessibility of STEM resources
Increased community outreach and education content distribution

keyProjects.name: ParamountProperty.my
keyProjects.description: Managed and expanded the Paramount Property website portfolio, growing the number of projects from 10 to 15 over 7 years.
highlights: Collaborated with the in-house IT team to ensure continuous service improvement and uptime
Contributed to increased user satisfaction and efficiency
Supported sustained business growth through digital presence optimization

keyProjects.name: BersatuForMakan - Fishermen x BFM Campaign
keyProjects.description: Contributed to a collaborative campaign with BFM 89.9 to highlight Malaysia's rich culinary heritage after the omission from Netflix's Street Food series.
highlights: Developed a dedicated microsite that played a key role in driving campaign success
With a modest budget of RM2000, reached almost 3 million people and generated RM700k in earned media
Achieved a 628% increase in engagement and sixfold growth in followers, providing significant PR mileage for BFM

personalAchievements: Self-Taught Developer: Successfully self-taught to become a seasoned full-stack web developer, continuously expanding expertise in the latest technologies and industry best practices
Team Leadership: Groomed junior developers, instilling best practices and reducing onboarding time. Pitched new project management processes that improved team cohesion and efficiency
Project Management: Managed projects from concept to launch, delivering on time and implementing agile methodologies for improved team productivity
professionalPhilosophy: I am passionate about continuous learning and creating impactful, user-centric solutions through cutting-edge technology. I value simplicity and clarity in design, and approach UX challenges with both philosophical and creative problem-solving. I strive for a balance in work and life through interests like music, woodworking, and art. Currently exploring AI integration in web development.
additionalCompetencies: Project planning and documentation methodology implementation
UI/UX design principles and best practices

highlights: Focus on Computer Games Design
Documentation & Design
Art & Design Fundamentals
Multimedia Design Fundamentals

interests: Exploring emerging technologies in web development
